## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G43420](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G43420)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>RTN20</u>
- **Gene Name:** reticulon 20
- **Description:**   3-beta hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase/isomerase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2058223
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
